name: epel.dcache
description: dCache provides methods for exchanging data with backend (tertiary) Storage Systems as well as space management, pool attraction, dataset replication, hot spot determination and recovery from disk or node failures.
releaseNotes: dcap-libs: enforce IOV_MAX if system doesn't provide it on some OSes IOV_MAX is not defined and allowed dcap library to misbehave in case of large vector requests.
